lemma Unassigned_botdefault: "\<forall> e1 e2. e2 \<noteq> Unassigned \<longrightarrow> \<not> allowed_secgw_flow e1 e2 \<longrightarrow> \<not> allowed_secgw_flow Unassigned e2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>e1 e2.
       e2 \<noteq> Unassigned \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow e1 e2 \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow Unassigned e2

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>e1 e2.
       e2 \<noteq> Unassigned \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow e1 e2 \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow Unassigned e2

proof (prove)
goal (5 subgoals):
 1. \<And>e1 e2.
       e2 = PolEnforcePoint \<Longrightarrow>
       e2 \<noteq> Unassigned \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow e1 e2 \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow Unassigned e2
 2. \<And>e1 e2.
       e2 = PolEnforcePointIN \<Longrightarrow>
       e2 \<noteq> Unassigned \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow e1 e2 \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow Unassigned e2
 3. \<And>e1 e2.
       e2 = DomainMember \<Longrightarrow>
       e2 \<noteq> Unassigned \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow e1 e2 \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow Unassigned e2
 4. \<And>e1 e2.
       e2 = AccessibleMember \<Longrightarrow>
       e2 \<noteq> Unassigned \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow e1 e2 \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow Unassigned e2
 5. \<And>e1 e2.
       e2 = Unassigned \<Longrightarrow>
       e2 \<noteq> Unassigned \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow e1 e2 \<longrightarrow>
       \<not> allowed_secgw_flow Unassigned e2

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>e1. allowed_secgw_flow e1 PolEnforcePointIN
 2. \<And>e1. allowed_secgw_flow e1 AccessibleMember

proof (prove)

 4. \<And>e1.

 5. \<And>e1.

definition PolEnforcePointExtended_offending_set:: "'v graph \<Rightarrow> ('v \<Rightarrow> secgw_member) \<Rightarrow> ('v \<times> 'v) set set" where
  "PolEnforcePointExtended_offending_set G nP = (if sinvar G nP then
      {}
     else 
      { {e \<in> edges G. case e of (e1,e2) \<Rightarrow> e1 \<noteq> e2 \<and> \<not> allowed_secgw_flow (nP e1) (nP e2)} })"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x xa.
       (if sinvar x xa then {}
        else {{(e1, e2).
               (e1, e2) \<in> edges x \<and>
               e1 \<noteq> e2 \<and>
               \<not> allowed_secgw_flow (xa e1) (xa e2)}}) =
       (if sinvar x xa then {}
        else {{e \<in> edges x.
               case e of
               (e1, e2) \<Rightarrow>
                 e1 \<noteq> e2 \<and>
                 \<not> allowed_secgw_flow (xa e1) (xa e2)}})

interpretation PolEnforcePointExtended: SecurityInvariant_ACS
where default_node_properties = default_node_properties
and sinvar = sinvar

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. SecurityInvariant_ACS sinvar default_node_properties &&&
    set_offending_flows = PolEnforcePointExtended_offending_set

    set_offending_flows = PolEnforcePointExtended_offending_set

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>G f nP.
       \<lbrakk>wf_graph G; f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>i\<in>fst ` f.
                            \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := Unassigned))
 2. \<And>otherbot.
       \<forall>G f nP i.
          wf_graph G \<and>
          f \<in> set_offending_flows G nP \<and>
          i \<in> fst ` f \<longrightarrow>
          \<not> sinvar G (nP(i := otherbot)) \<Longrightarrow>
       otherbot = Unassigned
 3. set_offending_flows = PolEnforcePointExtended_offending_set
